Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone scored an unbeaten 124 off 84 balls
Shai Hope scored 117 but it was deemed irrelevant by himself post-match
England won by 5 wickets with 15 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Hope described his own hundred as 'irrelevant' stating it didn't contribute to wins
Liam Livingstone praised his team and Sam Curran in his post-match interview
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Wallace mentioned Livingstone's rapid acceleration in the last 26 balls of his innings
Livingstone played 32 ODIs and 50 T20Is, averaging 35 in ODIs and 26 in T20Is
Others: The outfield was heavy and the surface was up and down
England won the toss and decided to field
